labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: 'hello' and 'goodbye' are a single space apart, following normal html whitespace collapsing rules.
data.expected_result: 'hello' and 'goodbye' should have a wide space between them
data.short_description: Whitespace in messages is unexpectedly collapsed when using >100% font size
data.steps_to_repro: - set Chat Font Scaling to a value above 100% - send 'hello      goodbye' in chat (several spaces between the two words)
